channel.title: Staffzone
channel.description: How Do i Make A STaffZone For My Server

item.title: Staffzone
item.dc:creator: @gary1988 gary1988
item.description:
@gary1988 wrote:

yeah its quite simple for a staffzone dude

if u wanna add trees and skilling stuff for staff to do there, then simply add them to ur newobject/createobject list which can be found in client.java if u search for createobject/makeglobalobject u shud find the list of already added objects, same for bankz any other global object, just add them there,

if u want npcs there or anything then u add that to the auto spawn list, note for adding stuff like trees and ranges and stuff make sure u use the same id codes for the objects already added to ur server or they wont work

goodluck dude =)

gary

Read full topic

item.title: Staffzone
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

case ####: if(playerRights >= 1) { teleportToX = %%%%; teleportToY = %%%%; } else { sendMessage("You need to be staff to enter here!"); }

% = Coordinates

= Object ID

Add it under your Object Click One packet.

Read full topic

item.title: Staffzone
item.dc:creator: @raulhenriq raulhenriq
item.description:
@raulhenriq wrote:

you must set an area where u like to do it and make a teleport to there who only work for rights 1,2 or 3…i dont know what you’re exactly wanting for…
if you are a new coder or not too much experienced, i suggest only add a portal on autospawn and edit that one at client to take u there.
